verses.t: And{G2532} after{G3326} these things{G5023} I heard{G191} a great{G3173} voice{G5456} of much{G4183} people{G3793} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Alleluia{G239}; Salvation{G3588}, and{G2532} glory{G3588}, and{G2532} honour{G3588}, and{G2532} power{G3588}, unto the Lord{G2962} our{G2257} God{G3588}:

For{G3754} true{G228} and{G2532} righteous{G1342} are his{G846} judgments{G3588}: for{G3754} he hath judged{G2919} the great{G3173} whore{G3588}, which{G3748} did corrupt{G5351} the earth{G3588} with{G1722} her{G846} fornication{G3588}, and{G2532} hath avenged{G1556} the blood{G3588} of his{G846} servants{G3588} at{G1537} her{G846} hand{G3588}.
And{G2532} again{G1208} they said{G2046}, Alleluia{G239}. And{G2532} her{G846} smoke{G3588} rose up{G305} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}.

And{G2532} the four{G5064} and{G2532} twenty{G1501} elders{G4245} and{G2532} the four{G5064} beasts{G2226} fell down{G4098} and{G2532} worshipped{G4352} God{G3588} that sat{G2521} on{G1909} the throne{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Amen{G281}; Alleluia{G239}.

And{G2532} a voice{G5456} came out{G1831} of{G1537} the throne{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Praise{G134} our{G2257} God{G3588}, all{G3956} ye his{G846} servants{G3588}, and{G2532} ye that{G3588} fear{G5399} him{G846}, both{G2532} small{G3398} and{G2532} great{G3173}.

And{G2532} I heard{G191} as it were{G5613} the voice{G5456} of a great{G4183} multitude{G3793}, and{G2532} as{G5613} the voice{G5456} of many{G4183} waters{G5204}, and{G2532} as{G5613} the voice{G5456} of mighty{G2478} thunderings{G1027}, saying{G3004}, Alleluia{G239}: for{G3754} the Lord{G2962} God{G3588} omnipotent{G3588} reigneth{G936}.

Let us be glad{G5463} and{G2532} rejoice{G21}, and{G2532} give{G1325} honour{G3588} to him{G846}: for{G3754} the marriage{G3588} of the Lamb{G3588} is come{G2064}, and{G2532} his{G846} wife{G3588} hath made{G2090} herself{G1438} ready{G2090}.

And{G2532} to her{G846} was granted{G1325} that{G2443} she should be arrayed{G4016} in fine linen{G1039}, clean{G2513} and{G2532} white{G2986}: for{G1063} the fine linen{G1039} is{G2076} the righteousness{G3588} of saints{G40}.

And{G2532} he saith{G3004} unto me{G3427}, Write{G1125}, Blessed{G3107} are they which{G3588} are called{G2564} unto{G1519} the marriage{G3588} supper{G3588} of the Lamb{G3588}. And{G2532} he saith{G3004} unto me{G3427}, These{G3778} are{G1526} the true{G228} sayings{G3588} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} I fell{G4098} at{G1715} his{G846} feet{G3588} to worship{G4352} him{G846}. And{G2532} he said{G3004} unto me{G3427}, See{G3708} thou do it not{G3361}: I am{G1510} thy{G4675} fellowservant{G4889}, and{G2532} of thy{G4675} brethren{G3588} that have{G2192} the testimony{G3588} of Jesus{G3588}: worship{G4352} God{G3588}: for{G1063} the testimony{G3141} of Jesus{G3588} is{G2076} the spirit{G3588} of prophecy{G3588}.

And{G2532} I saw{G1492} heaven{G3588} opened{G455}, and{G2532} behold{G2400} a white{G3022} horse{G2462}; and{G2532} he that sat{G2521} upon{G1909} him{G846} was called{G2564} Faithful{G4103} and{G2532} True{G228}, and{G2532} in{G1722} righteousness{G1343} he doth judge{G2919} and{G2532} make war{G4170}

His{G846} eyes{G3788} were as{G5613} a flame{G5395} of fire{G4442}, and{G2532} on{G1909} his{G846} head{G3588} were many{G4183} crowns{G1238}; and{G1161} he had{G2192} a name{G3686} written{G1125}, that{G3739} no man{G3762} knew{G1492}, but{G1487} he himself{G846}.
And{G2532} he{G4016} was clothed with{G4016} a vesture{G2440} dipped{G911} in blood{G129}: and{G2532} his{G846} name{G3588} is called{G2564} The Word{G3588} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} the armies{G3588} which were in{G1722} heaven{G3588} followed{G190} him{G846} upon{G1909} white{G3022} horses{G2462}, clothed in{G1746} fine linen{G1039}, white{G3022} and{G2532} clean{G2513}.

And{G2532} he hath{G2192} on{G1909} his vesture{G3588} and{G2532} on{G1909} his{G846} thigh{G3588} a name written{G3588}, KING{G1125} OF KINGS{G935}, AND{G935} LORD{G2532} OF LORDS{G2962}.

And{G2532} I saw{G1492} an{G1520} angel{G32} standing{G2476} in{G1722} the sun{G3588}; and{G2532} he cried{G2896} with a loud{G3173} voice{G5456}, saying{G3004} to all{G3956} the fowls{G3588} that fly{G4072} in{G1722} the midst of heaven{G3321}, Come{G1205} and{G2532} gather yourselves together{G4863} unto{G1519} the supper{G3588} of the great{G3173} God{G2316};

And{G2532} I saw{G1492} the beast{G3588}, and{G2532} the kings{G3588} of the earth{G3588}, and{G2532} their{G846} armies{G3588}, gathered together{G4863} to make{G4160} war{G4171} against{G3326} him{G3588} that sat{G2521} on{G1909} the horse{G3588}, and{G2532} against{G3326} his{G846} army{G3588}.

And{G2532} the beast{G3588} was taken{G4084}, and{G2532} with{G3326} him{G5127} the false prophet{G3588} that wrought{G4160} miracles{G3588} before{G1799} him{G846}, with{G1722} which{G3739} he deceived{G4105} them{G3588} that had received{G2983} the mark{G3588} of the beast{G3588}, and{G2532} them{G3588} that worshipped{G4352} his{G846} image{G3588}. These both{G1417} were cast{G906} alive{G2198} into{G1519} a lake{G3588} of fire{G3588} burning{G2545} with{G1722} brimstone{G3588}.

And{G2532} the remnant{G3062} were slain{G615} with{G1722} the sword{G3588} of him{G3588} that sat{G2521} upon{G1909} the horse{G3588}, which{G3588} sword proceeded{G1607} out of{G1537} his{G846} mouth{G3588}: and{G2532} all{G3956} the fowls{G3588} were filled{G5526} with{G1537} their{G846} flesh{G3588}.
